trans-unit.source: Displays a message box.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: A message box is a prefabricated modal dialog box that displays a text message to a user.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊是預先製作好強制回應對話方塊，顯示一則簡訊給使用者。

trans-unit.source: You show a message box by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 您藉由呼叫靜態顯示訊息方塊<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: The text message that is displayed is the string argument that you pass to <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字訊息為字串引數傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Several overloads of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method also enables you to provide a title bar caption.
trans-unit.target: 數個多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法也可讓您提供標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: To enable a user to close a message box, <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> displays a message box that has an **OK** button and a **Close** button in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓使用者關閉訊息方塊中，<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>顯示訊息方塊具有**確定**按鈕和**關閉**標題列中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a message box to ask a user a question.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用訊息方塊詢問問題的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The user answers by clicking one of several buttons that you specify to display by using the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 按一下其中一個您指定要使用顯示的數個按鈕的使用者答案<xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: You can pass this enumeration to several overloads of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將這個列舉型別傳遞至數個多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton> enumeration is <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton.OK>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton>列舉型別是<xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton.OK>。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which button a user clicks by examining the value that <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷哪一個按鈕，使用者按一下藉由檢查值，<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a value of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult> enumeration, where each value equates to one of the buttons that a message box can display.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是值為<xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult>列舉，其中每個值等於其中一個按鈕可以顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: The default value for message box is <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult.OK> because **OK** is the default message box button.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊的預設值是<xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult.OK>因為**確定**是預設的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: However, some overloads of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method enable you to provide a different <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult> default value.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有些多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法可讓您提供其他<xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult>預設值。

trans-unit.source: Message boxes can communicate information and can ask questions that have varying degrees of importance.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊可以進行通訊的資訊，而且可以要求具有不同程度的重要性的問題。

trans-unit.source: Message boxes use icons to indicate importance.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊會使用圖示來表示重要性。

trans-unit.source: For example, icons can indicate whether the message is informational, is a warning, or is important.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，圖示可以表示訊息是告知性、 是一個警告，或很重要。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage> enumeration encapsulates the set of possible message box icons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage>列舉封裝可能的訊息方塊圖示的設定。

trans-unit.source: By default, a message box does not display an icon.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，訊息方塊不會顯示圖示。

trans-unit.source: However, you can pass a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage> value to one of several <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method overloads in order to specify that the message box includes an icon.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以傳遞<xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage>值設為其中數個<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法多載，以指定訊息方塊包含圖示。

trans-unit.source: Message boxes sometimes provide special functionality, such as right-to-left reading.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊有時會提供特殊功能，例如由右至左讀取。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the behavior of a message box by using one or more <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions> enumeration values that are accepted by some overloads of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列其中一個或多個自訂訊息方塊的行為<xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions>列舉值，一些多載會接受<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Message boxes always have an owner window.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊一律會有主控視窗。

trans-unit.source: By default, the owner of a message box is the window that is currently active in an application at the time that a message box is opened.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，訊息方塊的擁有者是目前作用中時，會開啟訊息方塊應用程式中的視窗。

trans-unit.source: However, you can specify another owner for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> by using one of several <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以指定另一個擁有者<xref:System.Windows.Window>使用一種<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>多載。

trans-unit.source: For more information about owner windows, see <xref:System.Windows.Window.Owner%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需擁有者的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Window.Owner%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [MessageBox Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[MessageBox 範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023)。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: Use an overload of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method, which enables you to specify an owner window.
trans-unit.target: 使用的多載<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法，可讓您指定主控視窗。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the message box is owned by the window that is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 否則，訊息方塊的擁有者是目前作用中視窗。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box that has a message and that returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊，該訊息方塊含有訊息並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box that has a message and title bar caption; and that returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊，該訊息方塊含有訊息和標題列標題並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that represents the owner window of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />，表示訊息方塊的主控視窗。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的視窗前顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: The message box displays a message and returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊會顯示訊息並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，目前為作用中視窗的前面出現訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box that has a message, title bar caption, and button; and that returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊，該訊息方塊含有訊息、標題列標題和按鈕並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that represents the owner window of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />，表示訊息方塊的主控視窗。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的視窗前顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: The message box displays a message and title bar caption; and it returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊會顯示訊息和標題列標題，並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，目前為作用中視窗的前面出現訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> value that specifies the icon to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> 值，指定要顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box that has a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and that returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊，該訊息方塊含有訊息、標題列標題、按鈕和圖示並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that represents the owner window of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />，表示訊息方塊的主控視窗。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的視窗前顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: The message box displays a message, title bar caption, and button; and it also returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊會顯示訊息、標題列標題和按鈕，還會傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，目前為作用中視窗的前面出現訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> value that specifies the icon to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> 值，指定要顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies the default result of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定訊息方塊的預設結果。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box that has a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and that accepts a default message box result and returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊，該訊息方塊含有訊息、標題列標題、按鈕和圖示、接受預設訊息方塊結果並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that represents the owner window of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />，表示訊息方塊的主控視窗。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> value that specifies the icon to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> 值，指定要顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的視窗前顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: The message box displays a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and it also returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊會顯示訊息、標題列標題、按鈕和圖示，還會傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，目前為作用中視窗的前面出現訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> value that specifies the icon to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> 值，指定要顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies the default result of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定訊息方塊的預設結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions" /> value object that specifies the options.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions" /> 值物件，指定選項。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box that has a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and that accepts a default message box result, complies with the specified options, and returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊，該訊息方塊含有訊息、標題列標題、按鈕和圖示、接受預設訊息方塊結果、遵循指定之選項並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個多載的<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that represents the owner window of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />，表示訊息方塊的主控視窗。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> value that specifies the icon to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> 值，指定要顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies the default result of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定訊息方塊的預設結果。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的視窗前顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: The message box displays a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and accepts a default message box result and returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊會顯示訊息、標題列標題、按鈕和圖示、接受預設訊息方塊結果並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，目前為作用中視窗的前面出現訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that represents the owner window of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />，表示訊息方塊的主控視窗。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the title bar caption to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，指定要顯示的標題列標題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton" /> 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> value that specifies the icon to display.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxImage" /> 值，指定要顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies the default result of the message box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定訊息方塊的預設結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions" /> value object that specifies the options.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions" /> 值物件，指定選項。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的視窗前顯示訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: The message box displays a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and accepts a default message box result, complies with the specified options, and returns a result.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊會顯示訊息、標題列標題、按鈕和圖示、且接受預設訊息方塊結果、遵循指定之選項並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.MessageBoxResult" /> 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，目前為作用中視窗的前面出現訊息方塊。
